original_title: Are We Making A Film?: Behind the Scenes - Follow the Dead
overview: A documentary about 6 young filmmakers and their team as they embarked on a journey to create their own feature film, Follow the Dead, a story about Millennials in Ireland encountering an undead phenomenon. As they discover their processes creating the film we begin to discover that what they may have been more enamoured with something else they had created.... a family.
title: Are We Making A Film?: Behind the Scenes - Follow the Dead
